original_title: こんな顔して日本人！！ 滝沢ミッシェル
overview: Michelle Takizawa has Japanese citizenship, even though her face looks like a foreigner. She hid the fact that the actress that SOD had called to shoot a Western-style film was actually Japanese. Michelle only answers "YES!!" no matter what she says. She took advantage of that and even inserted two at the same time into her anal and mako (laughs).
title: A Japanese with Such a Face!! Michelle Takizawa
